message.content:
cs.SY, cs.IT, cs.AI, cs.CR, cs.MA

Reasoning: 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper deals with a mathematical model of a surveillance system based on a net of sensors, which can be considered as a control system. 
- cs.IT (Information Theory): The paper discusses the signals acquired by each node of the net, which are Markovian processes, and the detection of the transition probability change, which can be related to information theory. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The paper proposes a model of a fusion center based on a simple game, which can be considered as an AI technique. 
- cs.CR (Cryptography and Security): The paper deals with a surveillance system, which can be related to security, and proposes a model of multivariate disorder detection, which can be related to cryptography. 
- cs.MA (Multi-Agent Systems): The paper discusses a net of sensors, which can be considered as a multi-agent system.
